00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 
00029 #ifndef COMPILE_ON_WINDOWS
00030         #ifndef COMPILE_NO_X
00031 
00032                 #ifdef Bool
00033                         // Someone has defined Bool ?
00034                         #undef Bool
00035                 #endif
00036 
00037                 #include <X11/Xlib.h>
00038 
00039                 // Too bad that X11/Xlib.h defines Bool, Error and Success... this basically
00040                 // SUX since we can't use them anywhere in the source!
00041                 // this breaks, enums in Qt, enums in KVIrc and other stuff all around...
00042                 // Shame on you Xlib.h author :D
00043 
00044                 #ifdef Bool
00045                         // NO!
00046                         #undef Bool
00047                 #endif
00048 
00049         #endif // !COMPILE_NO_X
00050 #endif
00051 
00052 #endif //_KVI_XLIB_H_
